bwwExcerpt: The proceedings, all in all, are rather schizoid. Those seeking a smart night out, with sharply-delineated themes, are likely to react with a weary ‘Boop-Boop-a-Droop.’ There’s always the danger of showstopper fatigue setting in, as if you’ve eaten eight or nine hot fudge sundaes in a row. But as a respite from present-day realities and woes, and you know the ones I mean, Boop! could just be the tonic the doctor ordered.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic presents a fundamentally mixed view, warning intellectual theatergoers away while suggesting it could work as escapist entertainment, landing in conditional recommendation territory. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses mixed feelings, highlighting both fatigue and potential enjoyment, leading to a conditional recommendation.

dtliExcerpt: In “Boop! The Musical,” the canonical cartoon recounts stints as a lion tamer, judge and hula dancer — professions lifted straight from her shorts. But evidently, Betty Boop missed a credit: magician. Because by the end of this new musical, she left us all boop-boop-a-bewitched.
